triples.name: Game theory
triples.relevance: The paper builds on classical game theory concepts and deviations from their predictions.

triples.name: Economic fairness
triples.relevance: Fairness is identified as a key reason people deviate from purely self-interested behavior.

triples.name: Cooperation
triples.relevance: The paper discusses how people attempt to cooperate with others despite self-interest predictions.

triples.name: Learning
triples.relevance: The paper proposes carefully modeling the learning process through which behavioral deviations disappear.

triples.name: Nash equilibrium
triples.relevance: The paper explains how behavior converges to game-theoretic equilibrium through learning.
